column4: anyone know why I get "Playback device not found" when trying to play midi?
AFAIK it's because MIDI is not set up by default on Ubuntu. Go searching the wiki/forums.
-- got all the sound card set.  Timidity works find... trying to get the EMU-8000 to kick in.  Mods are all loaded.  Devices (sequencer) is created.
Okay, I have no idea, then. Sorry. :)
